attributes.action: Apprentices should be on the same minimum wage as everyone else
attributes.additional_details: Apprentices are on £3.30 p/h even with some of the most difficult jobs like carers when under 18's are delivering personal care and only getting £3.30 p/h when anyone who would get a full time job there would be getting £7.20 p/h for doing the exscact same work!
attributes.background: Apprentices are on a wage below minimum wage as to someone who is under 18 and studying there a levels with a weekend job ,they earn about the same with a part time weekend job then an apprentice does with a full time 5 days a week job!
